name: Edessa: School of Wizardry
summary: Edessa: School of Wizardry is a dark themed action game set in a magical universe. Fight the demons that have plagued the world and cast your spells with the Edessa's unique spellcasting mechanic. Fight the bosses, solve the puzzles and come out on top.

name: Edge of Dawn
summary: In EDGE OF DAWN, players will craft, build, and survive in a mountainous winter landscape. Along with threats of hunger, thirst, and exposure to extreme temperatures, players will also need to adapt to the various enemies that inhabit EDGE OF DAWN in order to stay alive.

name: Edge of Death
summary: Edge Of DeathIt is a first-person horror survival adventure game. Players will experience various illusions between life and death with the protagonist, and experience a journey to the edge of death.

name: Edge
summary: Alex is supposed to just meet his girlfriend at a club. An ordinary evening, an ordinary city, an important meeting with people who can change his future. But the road to the club turns into a real nightmare.

name: Edge of Evil
summary: Edge of Evil is a first-person psychological horror game with a focus on story and exploration. Solve puzzles, meet interesting characters and unwrap and ancient mystery in this game of terror where an ancient seal has been broken upon entering a locked crypt and now the shadows of darkness have been unleashed into the mortal world.

name: Edna
summary: Edna is a side-scrolling 2D adventure where player takes control of an old witch and needs to engage in a various puzzles to progress the levels.

name: EdgeLords
summary: Confront your sorceress rivals and claim their magical 'essence' for your own in this fully-animated and voiced hentai card game!

name: Edge of Reality: Great Deeds - Collector's Edition
Eden
summary: Everyone, including you, is already infected. In the world of EDEN, a cure for the modern undead plague does exist - but where? How does one obtain the cure?

name: Eddie’s Puzzle Time
summary: Eddie’s Puzzle Time is an unreleased puzzle game for the Game Boy.

name: Edo no Kiba
summary:
Tokyo, 2050 AD. Terrorists are running wild in the streets, and only one armored police officer is fast enough to hunt them down.

In Edo no Kiba you are always moving forward, either running or walking (or, in some levels, flying), although you can still move around the screen as in most belt-scrolling games. Your avatar attacks by slashing to the right with his energy sword, and he can also hold his sword defensively to deflect some bullets. By then holding forward and releasing attack he can throw the sword like a boomerang. He can also jump. A bomb follows the avatar around on any on-foot level that can be used to destroy all enemies onscreen at any time, and it will be replaced whenever a life is lost. Environments range from city streets to sewers and a flying battleship. Each level ends with a boss fight against an enemy that can withstand many attacks.

name: Edge of Memories
summary: The Corrosion, a plague of unparalleled proportions, has already ravaged the Astryan continent. On the other side of the world, the continent of Avaris and its nomadic peoples—so far spared from the horrors spawned by this abomination—now stand on the brink of extinction. Eline, an itinerant Soul Whisperer, relentlessly battles the force that turns the once-thriving fauna, flora and humans of this lush land into grotesque abominations. Following a mysterious encounter, a dark power awakens within her, one that may hold the key to ending this apocalypse: the ability to control the Corrosion within her own body.

name: Edge of Twilight: Return to Glory
summary: Edge of Twilight: Return to Glory is a 3rd person action adventure game presenting a unique post-apocalyptic, Steampunk fantasy world that has been split into separate realms of Day and Night.

name: Edge
summary: Your goal is to balance the ball and avoid it from obstacles and from falling down.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Cul-de-Sac Smash
summary: Cul-de-Sac Smash is a game on Cartoon Network's website. Most of the characters from the show, with the exception of Jimmy, Nazz, and Sarah, are playable

name: Eden's Guardian
summary: Where shadow falls, it begins. Dive into Eden's Guardian, a challenging metroidvania experience with handmade pixel art set in a world with medieval and fantasy aesthetics devastated by conflict where the history of Gods and humans intertwine.

name: Edge of the End
summary: A young kid returns to his boyhood home in search of closure amid strong family ties and regrets while uncovering bittersweet memories.

name: Educational Games for Kids
summary: You are a parent and you are trying to relax a little by playing your favorite game. Your child keeps asking you to let them try it… But this game is not suitable for children (because it’s a little scary and not educational at all). Does this situation sound familiar? At last: a well thought-out, smart, polished, ‘console quality’ educational game pack is out for your kids. Suitable for boys and girls from ages 3 to 18. A pack of 21 different games with 51 variations that educate in various ways like: reflexes, logic, math, memory and knowledge. Keep track of your child's progress with our statistics. All games have easy-to-learn controls with interesting and fun things to do. At last, a pack of games designed to educate and make your children smarter. The game runs natively in FHD when supported.

name: Edxn
summary: Embark on a journey with Eva as she navigates the labyrinth of her mind, solving puzzles, battling inner demons, and exploring eerie landscapes in the haunting world of edxn. Uncover forgotten memories and navigate the delicate balance between sanity and despair in this immersive adventure.

name: Edge of Reality
summary: It seems that there can be no more boring profession in the world than a pawnshop appraiser. But a meeting with a mysterious but pretty stranger changes Dan's idea of his job.

name: Eden Blue
summary: Eden Blue takes a lot of inspiration from fighting games, and adventure games. What separates Eden Blue from your standard "beat em up," is its intricate combat system. Eden Blue takes a number of elements seen in traditional fighting games, and streamlines it for people of all experience levels to enjoy. Eden Blue will feature a full length story mode, alongside a several other modes we hope to announce in the near future.

name: Edgar Allan Poe's Interactive Horror: 1995 Edition
summary: Originally released as The Dark Eye, this 1995 cult classic adapts Edgar Allan Poe's most macabre tales. Navigate a nightmarish world of uncanny stop-motion puppetry narrated by William S. Burroughs. Solve twisted puzzles and experience madness through the eyes of both murderer and victim.

name: Edelweiss
summary: "Edelweiss" is a Japanese-inspired horror RPG that follows the journey of Ayla and her friend lost in a dense forest with no cellphone signal. In search of assistance, Ayla with her friends found to an abandoned orphanage, setting the stage for a spine-chilling horror narrative.

name: Eden's Last Sunrise
summary: A classic tactics RPG where magic and technology clash to determine the fate of the world. Command tactical battles, befriend and train your troops, create custom heroes, and experience the story through multiple branching paths.

name: Edward's Journey
summary: Set out on an epic journey to find your missing sister in a beautifully unique hand-crafted world full of secrets, puzzles, and danger.

name: Edmund and Eliza
summary: Edmund and Eliza is a medieval action adventure game about a knight named Edmund Dantes who ventures into a mysterious village in search of a merchant's missing daughter named Eliza Bonteri. Edmund and Eliza is a senior design capstone project for California State University of Northridge.

name: Edge of Dead: Under a Uranium Sky
summary: Edge Of Dead is an action roguelike game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Use shotguns, power saws, axes, hand grenades, cybernetic implants, and more to battle your way across the scorched landscape.

name: Edge of Galaxy
summary: Edge Of Galaxy - very beautiful game of space jigsaw puzzle game! Collect the full image of the different small pieces. You can either play with very relaxing on Casual mode, Customize mode or Challenge Mode with time attack, snapping difficulty, adjustable pieces size and others.

name: Edens Zero Deluxe Edition
summary:
● 72-Hours Early Access
Begins 72 hours in advance of release date.
● Pino's Attire "Hunter Attire"
Adds a quest offering Pino's Hunter Attire, which boosts the number of items acquirable through harvesting/mining.
● Accessory "Elsie’s Pirate Flag"
Adds a quest offering Elsie's Pirate Flag. With this back accessory, you can act like you're part of her crew!
* Adds quests offering DLC items in Exploration Mode to the Guild Quests at Shooting Starlight.

name: Eden*
summary: A tale of the planet's final love story told using the full force of minori's critically acclaimed illustrative style, engaging musical compositions, and the highly talented staff that has led fans coming back for more every single time!

name: Edgefield
summary: Edgefield is a mix of the adult visual novel, dating sim and point-and-click adventure genres with a wide and colorful cast of characters to meet, befriend, and romance (in fully animated scenes) as you make your way through your freshman year at Edgefield University.

name: Edda Café
summary: Edda Café is a visual novel made by Mushroomallow. It's a cute and heartwarming, yet unusual Valentine-theme love story for Valentine VN Jam 2021 event.

name: Ederon Online
summary:
Ederon is a Free Online Trading Card Game with over 1,000 unique cards and endless ways to build up your strategy and overthink your opponent. 
 
Battle against players from all over the world, make your career as a legendary top player, an achievement hunter, an exquisite card collector or just gather a bunch of friends and play for fun! 
 
Choose between 8 classes with unique styles of play, or merge them to create the ultimate multiclass deck! Gain free cards as you play, buy magic items, sell cards, trade with other players and try getting as many achievements as you can! There are many ways to improve your deck! 
 
Ederon is free to play, and the registration is simple. There is no need for any other personal information, just your e-mail. Register now and start battling!

name: Ednoka
summary: Ednoka is an educational game where studying and gaming meet. You can create your own quizzes, share them, and play them through various game worlds. Questions pop up during play and affect your gaming experience.

name: Eden Genesis
summary: Eden Genesis is a platform game focused on fast-paced trials, quick reflexes, and a rich story in a cyberpunk world dominated by neon lights and corporations. Take control of Leah, a young cyborg lady, and overcome challenging trials to liberate her corrupted mind!

name: Edge of the Wild
summary: Edge of the Wild is a survival adventure game where you play as Sara Avalon, a nature photographer left on a remote Alaskan island. Tasked to photograph the island's wildlife, Sara must navigate and survive the harsh environment, and uncover the island's hidden secrets.

name: Eden: Discovery
summary: Eden: Discovery is a post-apocalyptic extraction FPS for 20 players. Scavenge loot, battle AI and rivals, and escape with your gear—or lose it all. Use in-game currency, run tournaments, and trade in a creator-driven world where every choice carries real stakes.

name: Edens Zero
summary: This is a 3D action role-playing game based on the space fantasy comic/anime Edens Zero by Hiro Mashima, creator of Fairy Tail and Rave Master. The player controls a diverse cast of characters as they embark on an epic adventure across different planets while battling powerful enemies!

name: Ediction
summary:
Raised from the dead, a man whose life was riddled with pain is made to consider what his last words will be once again.

Ediction is a visual novel made for the Love + Attraction Jam 2025. It is a complete story, sitting at around 23k words. Please note that it contains and discusses heavy themes, particularly suicide, but also death, abuse, and body horror.

name: Edaqa's Room: Prototype
summary:
A Game Master is Needed -- Online escape & puzzle game

Prototype is a comedic online escape game featuring Wendy! She's looking for a new game master to run her shiny new escape room. Alas, during your introduction you've become trapped inside.

Edaqa's Room is all about puzzles. Search the environment for clues and objects. Turn up the brain power to work through logic logic puzzles. Press buttons, play with plush toys, and have fun! I even built-in a hint system to keep you moving when my design brainwaves don't align with yours.

This web game is built for multiplayer. Multiple people, I recommend 2-4, enter the same room from their own system. It works just like a real escape room, less all the sticky bits and bumping into each other.

name: Edge of Galaxy
summary: Edge of Galaxy is a real-time tactical space sim with RPG elements. You are the commander of a small fleet of mercenaries. Manage your fleet! Hire and dismiss, adjust and improve every ship, and increase your rank and glory!

name: Educational and Learning Bundle: 5 in 1
summary: This bundle contains five of top educational games for toddlers and kids. Hours of fun learning with puzzles, popping balloons, matching pairs and more!

name: Eden's Inferno
summary: Descend through Heaven and Hell in search of the one person who made you feel.

name: EDM Ballistics
summary: As Missile Division Commander in WWIII, complete high-risk missions to save your unit. Dodge defenses, strike to the beat, and manage weapons and budgets to survive an entertainment-driven war.

name: Eden Rising: Ascendant Expansion
summary: Unlock the definitive Eden Rising experience: the Ascendant Edition! Explore the entire world of Eden and get access to all sieges, gear, armor dyes, and more.

name: Edevreal's Theater: The Final Show
summary: Edevreal's Theater: The Final Show is a survival horror RPG with real-time combat. You must try to survive while exploring the hostile and strange theater of Edevreal to unravel all the dark mysteries it hides.

name: Ed & Edda: Grand Prix – Racing Champions
summary: Ed & Edda: GRAND PRIX - Racing Champions is a fun racing game for the whole family that brings the famous mascots of the Europa-Park to life. Players can - either alone or with their friends - race through several European landmarks to find out who is the fastest!

name: Edolie
summary: In the world of Edolie, people are gathering to celebrate the coming of Harvest, the biggest event of the year. But for Willow, this is going to be a harvest unlike any other. Experience the world of Edolie as you and a group of new found friends discover its secrets!

name: Edna: Out of Sight, Out of Control
summary: Play as Edna and make your way through a castle by possessing statues within your line of sight. Solve puzzles by manipulating doors, switches, and mirrors.

name: Eden
summary: Eden is a surreal horror enigma with branching paths.

name: Eden's Prison
summary: climb the tower of God

name: Edenfall
summary: Edenfall is the next instalment to the Seraphim Slum universe. Playing the previous game is recommended, but not required to understand Edenfall.

name: Edge of Sanity
summary: Set in the unforgiving lands of Alaska, Edge of Sanity is a Lovecraftian survival horror game with unique 2D art, a disturbing story, and complex base management. Gather resources, carefully plan your expeditions and explore the world of madness as you struggle to keep your humanity.

name: Edge of Sanity: Supporter Pack
summary: A collection of DLC for Edge of Sanity

name: Eduardo the Samurai Toaster
summary:
Battle wave after wave of enemies in this stylish side-scrolling run n' gun action game for one to four players

Fight your way through 13 diverse locations on your own or with up to three friends in this frenetic sidescrolling action game. Play as Eduardo and his fellow toaster buddies as you fire an assortment of pastries at all kinds of dastardly food products. Hop onto laser-mounted scooters and fly across the screen in rocket packs, and learn to cooperate with your teammates or simply annoy each other in an awesomely fun way by throwing each other around the screen. The choice is up to you.

name: Editor's Hell
summary: It’s been two days since you assigned to the editor job on the newspaper. After months of unemployment; you just had to took it. Maybe you have no idea how to do this but; you have a family to look after. Dreams, nightmares, don’t matter anymore; you have a new opportunity in your life.

name: Eden Eternal
summary: A free-to-play fantasy MMORPG where players choose one of 20 classes to adventure as, aid in the establishment of a player town, engage in PvP combat, unlock new classes and level up to become one of the strongest in all of Eden. Players set out to help the Eternal Guardians restore and keep peace throughout the Central Continent.

name: Edel Blume
summary: Edel Blume is a otome visual novel, developed by Design Factory and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Edge of Space
summary:
Suit up as an operative of the Ark Corporation, sent to the farthest reaches of the universe in search of habitable planets to terraform. However, after the long space journey you awaken from cryosleep to find that your ship has gone way off course and is disabled near a strange new world. With no choice but to descend to the surface and figure out how to survive long enough to complete your mission, you step into the escape pod.

Along the way you’ll gather resources to craft armor, weapons, facilities, and vehicles to help you explore the world and conquer its aggressive inhabitants. Your base of operations will evolve from a few basic facilities exposed to the elements into a hardened fortress full of advanced technologies that let you accomplish amazing improvements to your equipment and alter the environment itself.

Be careful, though; almost everything down there wants to kill you, including fierce laser space sharks, artillery-toting polar bears, wickedly quick jetpack penguins, and even crazier horrors. Out on the Edge of Space, you must adapt or you die. Good luck, ArkCo Operative.

name: Edge: Mech-Ascent
summary: Welcome to the world of Edge: invaded. As an AFK Idle Strategy RPG, you could summon a mighty party of unique heroes from distinct races to build your fantasy dream team for winning the arena battles. Start thoroughly exploring the wonderland with your squad to save the world!

name: Eden Survivors
summary: Fight. Flirt. Save the galaxy. Eden Survivors combines rogue-like action, mech-building, and steamy Visual Novel storytelling. Recruit gorgeous heroines, battle through 30 epic levels and explore a universe where love and danger collide. Your adventure, your story, your desires.

name: Edd Skeleton Game
summary: Survive Edd Skeleton's "amazing" game, Mock his efforts, and watch him up the ante with scarier creatures, trickier puzzles, and surprises that will keep you on edge. Can you endure his trials and become friends... or will you just keep mocking his incompetence?

name: Eden of Ikemen: Love in a Lost World
summary:
Remake of Dead or Love with a reworked translation.

A free to play otome game with the theme survival and romance on a desert island.

name: Eden’s Frontier
summary: You are a young Bluveil on an epic journey of discovery — but you may have just made a terrible mistake! For fans of action and JRPGs, your NEXT ADVENTURE begins now!

name: Edge of Grief
summary: Edge of Grief is a 2D action platforming game about restoring a dark world to its former glory. It combines discovering deep emotions and an action platform experience as you become the ‘hero' unveiling the truth inside as you take another step closer to atonement

name: Edenwound
summary: A brutally difficult dungeon crawler rpg with roguelike elements. Face the horrors of Eden and uncover the truth, one expedition at a time.

name: Edge Of Existence
summary: Edge Of Existence. Is a throw back to the Classics of RTS where you can build up your base and build up your massive army. Ranging from Ground units , Air Units and Sea Units. We also take you on a story base RTS where a faction has a meaning to the map or why its in-game. We are a balance focus on PvP, PvE and Story/Campaign. We don't want focus on the PvP Competitive or ESports side of things. Since i feel like RTS games are ment for Story and Campaign. We also understand that alot of players don't even want to PvP so they expect great PvE so we hope to have the right Balance between all those 3 core gameplays. We want make a RTS thats plays from the Classics but has the Graphics of New Gens for the players that haven't experienced the great RTS games we had in the pass.

name: Edge Run
summary: You have to go through an amazing test, the outcome of which will decide your whole future life. However, not everything is as simple as it seems.

name: Eden Star
summary: Have you ever wanted to make a fresh start on an alien world? Eden Star is a survival game that drops you onto the alien landscape of Pharus 7, free to explore and gather resources, but you’ll want to be careful: death is permanent. You need to use resources to construct defences, craft weapons and build up outposts to protect your vital Eden Kit. With physics-based combat, free-form construction and destructible environments to explore.

name: Edelweiss
summary: Calm puzzle-platformer

name: Educational Virtual Reality Campus
summary: Step into EVRECA! Explore IoT with three engaging projects, visit a virtual museum showcasing student artwork, learn recycling through an interactive game, and master English prepositions with fun gameplay. EVRECA transforms education beyond traditional boundaries.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures
summary: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures is a 3D platform game based on the Cartoon Network animated television series Ed, Edd n Eddy. It was developed by Artificial Mind and Movement, Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and Cartoon Network Interactive, published by Midway Games and released on November 3, 2005, for the Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2, Xbox, Game Boy Advance, and PC. Midway announced the game on February 15, 2005.

name: Edelweiss Knights
summary: Edelweiss Knights is a bite-sized tactical RPG, where players lead a trio of heroes against almighty creatures.

name: Edge of Eternity
summary:
It’s a mystical, fantasy world where there’s lush greenery, vast plains, towering mountains – and dark spaceships. Yep. While it seems like your typical world of swords and magic, End of Eternity adds alien invasion in the mix, corrupting humans and animals alike, turning them into heartless metal monsters.

Daryon, the game’s redheaded hero, heads out to escape from the attacks of his own kind and ventures across Heryon in search for the way to save his world and define his own self along the way. But it seems that the Crystals have a different plan in mind…

name: Edengate: The Edge of Life
summary: Explore the deserted city of Edengate and follow a young scientist’s emotional journey as she searches for hope and solves the mystery of what happened to her... and the world.

name: Editarrr
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends in this pixel-perfect pirate platformer! Create your own levels and compete for swashbuckling supremacy on the global leaderboards.

name: Eden Island
summary: Eden Island is a realistic-style survival game. As a survivor, you will explore and survive on a beautiful tropical island, craft weapons against beasts, farm and hunt, build your own home.

name: Eden.schemata();
summary: EDEN.schemata(); is a multi-ending sci-fi mystery adventure game, featuring headless corpses, a sealed laboratory, a limbless android suspect/heroine, and an amnesiac protagonist. The game design and gradually UI change in reflection of your actions.

name: Edge of Soul: Ragnarok
summary: Echo of Soul is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game with a fast-paced action combat, various character customizations and no subscription fee required. Travel the vast open world, compete in PvP modes, and explore EoS.

name: Edge of Reality: Lost Secrets of the Forest - Collector's Edition
summary: A growing phenomenon threatens the forest...

name: Edna & Harvey: The Breakout - 10th Anniversary Edition
summary: Edna & Harvey are back! The award-winning adventure with high resolution visuals, new technology, intuitive controls – Experience this quirky cult classic with Edna & Harvey anew, but better than ever before!

name: Edge of Reality: The Legend of Greenbush - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save your friend from a sunken town’s curse?

name: Ed-0: Zombie Uprising
summary:
Ed-0: Zombie Uprising takes place in Edo era Japan—but millions of zombies have raided the isolated country! Enter this world as a Samurai, Sumo Wrestler, or Ninja to slaughter the massive horde of undead. Strengthen your character by gathering items and skills in unique dungeons. Everything is randomly generated each time you play! No run is the same. Dungeons won't be easy, so expect tension with every run—fight to the brink of death and make harsh decisions to survive.

Encounter countless surprises and unpredictable adversaries as you expand your power and achieve greatness. Every run is unique. Player judgment will be essential, having to face “once-in-a-lifetime” challenges amid a hoard of zombies.

name: Eden: Create World
summary: EDEN is a physical sandbox. No limits, create worlds and play the way you want! To create worlds, we give you a large set of tools, game mechanics, smart and not so smart NPCs, cars, weapons and many other interesting things.

name: Edna & Harvey: The Breakout
summary:
Edna & Harvey: The Breakout is an adventure game for Windows and Mac about a girl and her toy rabbit. Players of the game have to escape from a mental hostpital.

The Gameplay is similar to LucasArts' early 90's games using the SCUMM engine. The player finds himself in a 2D world. At the bottom of the screen is a list of verbs to be used and combined for solving puzzles.

The game began as a university project in Germany (Wikipedia). Although that version received an outstanding reception, the English game merely received a mixed reception with both average and low review scores, mostly due to the sloppy translation.

name: Edge
summary: In Edge players take direct control of the cube and roll their way around the game's dozens of levels. Search for all the prisms and find the shortcuts to improve your times.

name: Edge Islands
summary: Build your colony, train your team, explore and engage in turn-based tactical battles to protect and expand your domain! Shape unique stories by managing moods, relationships and ambitions in your group of adventurers.

name: Eden Crafters
summary: Embark on a journey of survival, crafting, and automation in Eden Crafters, a co-op, open-world game that challenges you to turn a hostile planet into a habitable haven for humanity. Temper the climate, create a breathable atmosphere, and turn toxic lakes into water: shape a new world!

name: Eden to Greeeen
summary: Eden to GREEEEN is a "tower offense" game for Android from iNiS.

name: Edge of Reality Visual Novel
summary: Dan, who works in a pawnshop, takes a very interesting brooch from a stranger, after which strange things happen to him. Now he has to find the suspicious man who bought the jewel to prevent something terrible.

name: Edmund Puzzle and The Mystery of the Sacred Relics
summary: Mystery. Adventure. Time travel. Get ready to embark on an epic adventure through time and space in Edmund Puzzle and the Mysteries of the Sacred Relics. In a world full of dangers and mysteries, every minute counts to save humanity from a mysterious and extremely dangerous enemy.

name: Edepth Angel: Pinocchio's Murder
summary: Which memory is true, which is false? Listen to the cyborg family's stories to help resolve a cold case without getting killed.

name: Edge of Tomorrow
summary: A Mobile First-Person Shooter movie-tie in to the 2014 sci-fi action thriller Edge of Tomorrow.

name: Eden Eternal: Seikyou Densetsu
summary: The return of classic MMORPG ! Global Direct Operations!Rich gameplays and multiple updates. Ride adorable alpaca and start your adventure with players worldwide!

name: "Edna & Harvey" Bundle
summary: Two legendary adventure games in one quirky bundle!

name: Edgar's Room
summary: Edgar's Room is a first person horror game. Find yourself in unique situations, solve puzzles and listen for any signs of Edgar's presence. You must find a way out of this house before it is too late. Don't get caught, pray you make it out alive!

name: Edge of Reality: Ring of Destiny
EDF Computer Base
summary: An EDF styled instillation that's been overrun by aliens.

name: Eden's Edge
summary: Eden's Edge is a 2.D vertical doujin Shoot 'em Up developed by x.x.

name: Edgar
summary: A 'poe', steampunk inspired platformer and hack n slash with a poetic story and challenging platforming and stragety based levels with a unique Ghost Phase shift ability! Featuring retro arcade graphics and charming details, this will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Edd-E
summary: Edd-E is a pixel-art game maker with custom visual scripting and publishing platform. Create games and Publish them with just one click. Play games from other creators or edit them. Learn programming and game development!

name: Eden
summary: Eden is a world full of adventure, exploration, creation, and play. Come join us as we create the world together.

name: Edo Mono
summary: Edo Mono is a historical simulation game for Playstation 2, released on 2005

name: Eden's Lair
summary: Fight a variety of enemies inside intense high action arenas.

name: Eddy Violet
summary: "Eddy Violet" is an Dreampunk and Postcyberpunk-based ACT game developed in the span of two years. I finished all the sections of game design by myself including 30 pieces of original music~

name: Edge Runner
summary:
Will you take a leap of faith?
Take a deep breath and get ready to cross the Himalayan edge.
Run like a wind, leap over botomless chasms, and become one with the mountains.
With clouds far below and clear sky above you, how far can you go before falling down?

name: Educational games for kids girls & boys apps free!
Editor in Chief: Level 1
summary:
Develop real-life editing skills for superior writing and top test scores!

This fun, highly-effective educational app teaches students in Grades 4-5 grammar, punctuation, spelling, capitalization, and critical reading in a standards-based thinking approach instead of the usual drill and practice found in competing products. Students begin with an easy-to-understand lesson followed by an activity that require students to carefully analyze and edit stories, letters, or articles that contain mechanical errors. This effective method allows students to gain mastery over concepts that will translate into their own writing.

name: Edingir Odyssey
summary: A turn-based, action-oriented RPG with a deep and highly interactive combat system, quirky and high energy hand-drawn art, and a vision that builds on inspiration from a certain beloved classic with an expanded design and skill-based gameplay!

name: Educator 2076: Basics in Education
summary: Welcome to the most modern school, where all classes are improved and a new education system has been introduced.

name: Eddie's Arcade
summary: Uniquely satisfying puzzle game spread out over different graphical themes. The puzzles get harder as you advance, giving you the pleasing sense of accomplishment. Collect arcade tokens to unlock new machines. Over 125 levels for hours of play.

name: Edge Guardian
summary:
Edge Guardian is a surreal-futuristic action beat-em-up for the HTC Vive. 
You have been summoned to defend the fringe of reality itself from a horde of reality-eating void cubes. 
Find yourself immersed in many different, eerie landscapes, punching your way through wave after wave of enemies.

name: Edd the Duck
summary: A Game Boy game was developed by Beam Software but never released. An altered version of their game Baby T-Rex, the game was pulled from distribution just before release when the BBC revoked the license but not before it received a negative review in Game Zone magazine.

name: Edge of Survival
summary: Escape to a relaxing, survival sandbox surrounded by wildlife and nature. Scavenge materials and craft tools to turn your base into a warm, well-supplied home. Survive by fishing, hunting, cooking, and growing your own food.

name: eDominations
summary: Game based on real life political, economy and military structure. You, as a player, have the chance to compare your skills of economic, strategic and diplomacy thinking, defending and building your own homeland in vast community of over 78 countries and thousands of players. You can be next world market monopolist. Next country dictator or democratic ruler. You can decide the fate of the planet with your brothers in arms. All is up to you and your way to DOMINATE.

name: Edenya
summary:
Edenya is French online role-playing game, 100% free, in which you play a character in a completely original medieval-fantasy world. You'll encounter many players from different places and cultures on the site forums or on Discord.

Edenya is a continuous game, so there are no turns, and all actions taken are immediately resolved. If you are new to the world of role-playing games, we recommend checking out the website of the French Federation of Role-Playing Games.

We hope to see you soon in the fantastic world of Edenya.

name: Eden Tomorrow
summary: Eden Tomorrow is a PlayStation VR game developed by Soulpix

name: Edge of Nowhere
summary: Edge of Nowhere is a VR third-person action-adventure from acclaimed independent developer Insomniac Games. Travel to the far reaches of the Antarctic mountains in search of a missing expedition team. What appears to be a rescue mission takes a turn as you venture into the deep unknown, and discover a surreal world that will test your wits and sanity. Scale towering mountains and use makeshift weapons to survive and avoid descending into madness. In Edge of Nowhere, nothing is what it seems and the unexpected lurks from all sides.

name: Edge of Oblivion
summary: Edge of Oblivion is a turn-based action roguelike. Face off against an ever growing horde as you battle towards the final boss. Create dynamic (and frankly absurd) builds to cleave through your foes. Think a few steps ahead and perfectly utilize your items to master the battlefield.

name: Edge of Endless
summary:
Edge Of Endless is the hottest new focus timer idle game hybrid to play while you do other things

Recharge the battery, start the vehicle. Keep moving forward until the battery runs out, then recharge it again until the next checkpoint.

name: EDF Overtaken
summary: A remake of a bobsp inspired map

name: Education
summary: Having done some terrible things in his youth at school, his memories call Bart Blake back to that place, in his nightmares.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Scam of the Century
summary: Ed, Edd n’ Eddy are trudging home from school when Eddy suddenly notices that his schoolbag feels a little light. There’s a hole in his schoolbag and all his stuff is missing, including his precious "Who To Scam and When" book. After years of being scammed, the neighborhood kids vow to take their revenge. Take control of the Eds as they make their way through tricks, traps, filthy animals, angry kids, and a barrage of ammunition including soap, dirty underwear, and broccoli. Help each Ed use their special talent to smash, scam, or brainstorm his way back into the cul-de-sac and ultimately battle The Masked Melonheaded Avenger and Splinter the Wonderwood.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Ed, Edd 'n Eddy: Scam of the Century

name: Ed-It
summary: You are a robot named Ed with the ability to dream. Use your abilities to platform through levels and dream your way around obstacles.

name: Ed's world story
summary: Protagonist 'Ed' lives in Kakariko village. He wants to become an adventurer who explore this great world. You can join Ed's adventure... find out a secret of the world.

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mescladasso DX
summary: Remaster of the original 2D collectathon platformer Ednaldo Pereira: MESCLADASSO. Play as Ednaldo and Fleig, going through a plethra of different stages.

name: Edwardo
summary: Edwardo is a stealth first-person horror game where you must search and collect samples using a UV-light. Beware! Edwardo is not happy that you have infiltrated his hideout and is armed with a Tommy gun.

name: EDM Storm: Match 3 VR
summary: Exciting match-3 puzzle game, with electronic music for climax！

name: Edge of Book
summary: Edge of Book is an independent game with the theme of ancient martial arts.

name: Edemn: Cyborg Skeleton
summary: A metallic cyborg designed to destroy everything in its path.

name: Edge of Realm
summary: A Touhou fan game and a 2D pixel shooting survival game, telling the story of Renko looking for her friend Merry in the destroyed Gensokyo, finding the truth about the destruction of Gensokyo and saving the world.

name: EdgeRunner
summary: The feeling of being observed rises every day to the point where it is uncomfortable. Why someone comments on everything I do and where is the end to all of that? Carbon copy of the loop of events with many endings of the story that has no end.

name: Edge Case
summary: EDGE CASE is a puzzle game about navigating, linking and altering the game world. It includes 22 levels of gradually increasing difficulty.

name: Eden
summary:
Eden is a game that's a bit hard to describe. You could say it's one part action game and two parts dating simulator, plus a teeny tiny bit of "stealth mission" thrown in. And the creator freely admits that while she's tried to tell a nice story, gameplay (and occasional silliness) sometimes takes precedent over logic here. 
 
Eden is also a game containing many secrets. Six known endings. Several achievements. Various subtle and not-so-subtle story and gameplay differences that depend on the choices you make. Be warned, though: once you commit to a choice, there's no turning back. At least not until the next playthrough. 
 
Good luck, and enjoy!

name: Eden Isle: Resort Paradise
summary: Create your very own resort in this award-winning game with glowing praise from reviewers and players! Attract different guest types, keep your guests happy, manage your resort and work towards a five star rating!

name: Edegard: Puqq
summary: Edegard: Puqq is an attention mining game where you need to craft and eat materials to stay alive. The decisions what you will take with you may become harder as more items are gathered in your cart. The space is limited, but the loot is endless.

name: Edge of Reality: Mark of Fate
summary: Legends become reality when a nightmare pirate stalks the streets of Saltshore!

name: Edelweiss Eiden Fantasia
summary:
On a desert island in the south there lies an all-girls school where students learn the mysterious art of alchemy. This strange academy, known as Eiden Academy, is the setting of Edelweiss, a tale of laughs and tears shared between the heroines, who lived their lives free of men on this island, and Haruma Kazushi, one of the silly boys who came here to score. This is an all-new game which picks up where Edelweiss ended.

The heroines of this new story are Takase Sakura and Fujisaki Rin, two background characters who dominated the popularity polls and conquered the original heroines. This fan-disk will present an all-new story full of laughs and naughty things.

One scenario begins when Sakura, the girl many people suspect is a lesbian, is hanging with the guys and evaluating other chicks with them. When Kazushi says there’s no way he would ever fall for Sakura, Sakura puts her pride as a girl on the line and their competition begins. If he falls for her, he loses! As their classmates start a betting pool to see who’ll win and interfering to better their chances, who knows what ending awaits, let alone how Eiden Island’s power will affect the outcome!

The other scenario begins when Rin and Kazushi are both elected as their class representatives. As the two grow closer together, Kazushi winds up in an accident trying to save her. As a result, he suddenly finds himself with something that speaks residing in his crotch.

name: Edifice of Fiends
summary: A challenging Rogue-Like Strategy RPG where every choice matters. Can you conquer the Edifice of Fiends?

name: Eden's Quest: The Hunt for Akua
EdelSuche
summary: EdelSuche is a Rockman-style-doujin-ish-action-platformer game where you play as Cecilia Wonderwand, a mage apprentice who finds herself in need to save the world from "The Rot".

name: Edentopia
summary: Explore a magical open world in our adventure crafting game. Craft spells, collect rare items, and fight bosses to expand your base. With endless customization and exploration, every playthrough is unique. Embrace the power of magic and survive in this treacherous world.

name: Edrick's Conquest
summary: Edrick's Conquest is an isometric open world Action RPG featuring unique gameplay, charming environments & competitive play. Explore Plesmur, a high fantasy world, on your own or with your allies.

name: Edouard Roivas: The Eye of Law
summary: A french Ace Attorney fan game with a entirely unique cast of characters.

name: Eden Rising
summary: Unite with your tribe as you explore, gather and craft all you need to defend the mysterious Crucibles that sustain you from an onslaught of dangerous creatures seeking to destroy them. Trade your humanity for power in an open world, action strategy game set in the vibrant alien realm of Eden.

name: Edgar Torronteras' Moto-X 2000
summary: Edgar Torronteras' Moto-X 2000 is a PC Motocross game developped by Deibus Studios and released in April 2000

name: Edmonton Trolley Car
summary: Players take an immersive VR historically accurate trolley car ride down 1915 Whyte Avenue, and then over the High Level Bridge. All the while receiving points for interacting with in-game characters, and for viewing historical Edmonton landmarks.

name: Edacity Snakes
summary: A snake clone.

name: Edge of Atlantis
summary: Edge of Atlantis is a Room-Scale VR Action Role-Playing Game for HTC Vive & Oculus Rift+Touch. Experience realistic physics-based combat and hardcore permadeath mode in a roguelike fantasy open-world, with procedurally enchanted weapons, strategic magical battles & dynamic events

name: Edgar A. Poe: The Oval Portrait
summary: What seems like a game may be something more. Is it a story waiting to be told or... felt? Enter the universe of Edgar A. Poe, where reason, like the devil, says "Goodnight".

name: Eden Warrior
summary: Embark on a journey to claim back what was yours. Battle legendary warriors of the past in simple but challenging setup. Free them from the entity that has corrupted them. Find out who you are!

name: Edge of Infinity
summary: Edge of Infinity is a multiplayer space warfare game. Enter your starship and challenge your friends to all-out battles across the stars. Each match will be unique; containing different ships, weapons, armies, and strategy - all decided by the player.

name: Eden: A Genesis Through Time
summary: A classic Sci-Fi adventure inspired by late 80s computer games. Explore an abandoned spacecraft and uncover the hidden horrors that lie throughout the ship.

name: Edge Not Found
summary: Sokoban puzzles on an endless grid.

name: Eddie's World
summary:
Venture through Tockin island as Eddie to recover stolen E-Tanks!

This game features Mega man styled gameplay mixed with puzzles and unusual boss fights.
8 standard and 1 special levels to complete and a big hub full of puzzles to explore.

Made with Megamix Engine.

name: Edemn
summary: Edemn is a fun and dynamic shooter about skeletons who have risen through ancient magic and are now fighting among themselves. The game is made in the style of games of the early 2000s, which creates a cool atmosphere for the game.

name: Edges
summary: Edges is a small fast paced game where you control a snake-like player on its path. The catch is in traps that are standing on its way - you have to move left or right to avoid them. Your player moves on its own and all you have to do is control its jumps left or right.

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile
summary: Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile is a captivating platform game inspired by platforming classics that offers an engaging and challenging gaming experience. Explore different stages filled with obstacles, enemies, and treasures to unlock. Overcome thrilling challenges, collect golden notes, and improve your skills while enjoying vibrant graphics and an exciting soundtrack with remixes of Ednaldo's classics.

name: Edge of Insanity
summary: Edge of Insanity is a first-person psychological horror game focusing on story and exploration. Your in control of Paul Carson, a TV Horror Show Host, who's currently locked in a haunted manor in search for the missing information of a crime that happened decades ago.

name: Edge of the Abyss Awaken
summary: "Edge of the abyss Awakening" is an adventure game that combines third-person, action, Roguelite and RPG strategy selection. Players can match different weapons, entries and talents to form various gameplays for adventurous challenges. You can play solo or in teams of up to three people.

name: Edge of Elsewhere
summary: Guide fledgling alchemist Saskia Hawthorn through her first year at magical university! Craft items, fulfil requests, rub shoulders with the Fae and maybe even date a boy in this otome alchemy dating sim!

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures - Midway Promotional Game
Edge of Dreams
summary: Edge of Dreams is a first person action with roguelike elements. You are the lone survivor in this strange space station. Shoot, explore, kill guards, create builds from items and skills, DIE, and repeat.

name: Eden Gamma
summary: In the world of Eden Gamma, find clues and let your gun do the talking in this side scrolling cybperpunk action-platformer!

name: Edenfall: Legacy of the First Wardens
summary: A story-driven action adventure combining exploration with combat. Untangle the mysteries of Eden - a forgotten realm as Venya. With help of Alkina the Spirit Fox you gain magic powers and learn how to transform into animals, unleashing their unique skills to restore the Crystal of Light.

name: Edvog Explorer Game
summary: A Casual Video Game Like No Other. 3D Platformer with Original Levels from A Third-person Camera View. Game Action: Collect golden balls in a limited period of time. No Violence or Stress, A Game for All Ages.

name: Edges 2
summary: Edges 2 is a small fast paced game where you control a snake-like player on its path. The catch is in traps that are standing on its way - you have to move left or right to avoid them. Your player moves on its own and all you have to do is control its jumps left or right.

name: Eddie Hill in the Curse of the Skull Medallion
summary: Help Eddie to retrieve the Skull Medallion sitting atop a mountain walled by a perilous jungle and an ancient temple full of dangers.

name: Eddsworld: The Masquerade
summary: A crossover AU between "Eddsworld" and "Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines". Share the adventures of four vampires who have to put their differences aside in order to survive in the world of darkness. Dark places, dark secrets, dark humour...everything is dark around here!

name: Edge of Chaos
summary:
A real-time strategy Renaissance 
 
Edge of Chaos draws heavily from medieval history & folklore as well Anglo-Saxon and Celtic myths, superstitions and literary works such as Beowulf. We then melded this new medieval fantasy world with prehistory, rewriting it such that Ice Age beasts would roam our world, changing its cultures and history forever.

name: Edward's Manor
summary: The Edwards are moving! And luckily for you, that comes with a paycheck. Help tag the pending furniture for Don Jorge's Moving Company. We are counting on you! Disclosure: D.J.M.C. is not liable for any damages or deaths during your work hours.

name: Edens Zero: Pocket Galaxy
summary:
Introducing the new mobile game from artist Hiro Mashima’s highly popular manga EDENS ZERO!

A faithful adaptation of its world and story in stunning graphics that will move both fans of the anime and original manga, as well as those yet to explore it, to tears!

Blast off into space with just your phone! Start your adventure with Pocket Galaxy!

name: Ed Grimley
summary: Based on a TV show, it was released in 1989.

name: Educational Pack of Kids Games
summary: Learn while playing video games!

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Cul de Sac Smash II - Wheels of Fury
summary: An Ed, Edd n Eddy game where various characters from the show compete in building cars and then bumping them into each other until only one character stands.

name: EDYN
summary: Join the battle for EDYN, the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Build settlements, command armies, and unify the realms in epic PvP warfare to etch your legacy into history.

name: Eden Remains: Arrival
summary: Eden Remains: Arrival is a Sci-fi First Person Action-Survival game. You play an elite dropship trooper sent to investigate a distress signal at a remote research facility on Eden. Fight, gather resources, manage vitals and craft supplies to stay alive.

name: Edge of Sanity: Eldritch Edition
summary: Explore a world of madness as you struggle to keep your humanity

name: Edengrad
summary: Edengrad is an advanced MMO game that stands out for a non-linear storyline and unconventional quests. Become a mercenary, set up a faction, spearhead your town, create a trading superpower and conquer the wilderness of Arizona!

name: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes
summary:
In Edna & Harvey: Harvey’s New Eyes, players return to the world of adventure game hit Edna & Harvey: The Breakout. Be prepared to meet many old friends and discover many new hand-made cartoon locations, realized in full HD glory!

Lilli, a young girl at a convent school, is the main character of Edna & Harvey: Harvey’s New Eyes. Seemingly the best-behaved little girl in the world, she executes all her chores in a diligent manner, no matter how unfair they may be. Her innocent, imperturbable way of carrying out the orders of others has something both tragic and eerie about it. Any angry thoughts, any childlike disobedience is buried deep beneath a seemingly impenetrable surface of sweetness. But how long will these feelings stay hidden? And where do the friendly little gnomes come from that paint over everything unpleasant in Lilli’s vicinity with a pleasant pink color? Are they real or just a product of her subconscious?

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures
summary: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures is a 3D platform game based on the Cartoon Network animated television series Ed, Edd n Eddy. It was developed by Artificial Mind and Movement, Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and Cartoon Network Interactive, published by Midway Games and released on November 3, 2005, for the Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2, Xbox, Game Boy Advance, and PC. Midway announced the game on February 15, 2005.

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mescladasso
summary: Ednaldo Pereira: Mescladasso is a video game based on Ednaldo Pereira's audiovisual experience and all the stories and cultures that are encompassed involving such a person. The game presents an original story in which Ednaldo Pereira and his friend Fleig The Bass Player defend the universe from a robot invasion created by The Dark Elite.

name: Edward Grabowski's: The Blue & The Gray
summary: As the Leader of the Federal or Confederate army, you have only four years to defeat the opposition by capturing cities and winning military conflicts. More your divisions across a map of America at the CAMPAIGN level. When two forces meet, you'll battle hand-to-hand to a micro-miniatures battle. But the time, only you can determine the victor...by applying your own knowledge, strategy, and luck. The future of America is in your hands

name: Eddie Kidd Jump Challenge
summary: Eddie Kidd Jump Challenge is a 1985 vehicle simulation game released for the Commodore 64, MSX, ZX Spectrum, Acorn Electron and BBC Micro, licensed by British stunt performer, Eddie Kidd.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Jawbreakers!
summary: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Jawbreakers is a video game released on March 25, 2003, by Cartoon Network Interactive, based on the popular television cartoon Ed, Edd n Eddy for the Game Boy Advance. It was developed by Climax Group and BAM! Entertainment. The game mirrors Ed, Edd (Double Dee), and Eddy's television quest to make money to buy jawbreakers.

name: Edge of Collapse
summary: In the dead of winter, an EMP attack destroys the US power grid. For Hannah, however, it’s the best day in 5 years. She was imprisoned in a psycho's basement - explosion releases the lock of her prison. Now she can begin the search for her family while feeling the breath of her abuser on her neck.

name: Edge of War
summary: Edge of War delivers an isometric, turn-based CRPG where the world reacts to you. All side quests are main quests, as every decision matters and impacts the fate of the Northlands. Explore and complete missions, but keep your heroes on their toes: the wilds do not forgive.

name: Edge of Hearts
summary:
Edge of hearts - a game in which you can feel yourself in the role of one of the heroes called from different worlds, relive their stories, and have fun while fighting with many enemies.
Our team loves classic beat-em-ups, adventure games, and good fantasy, so we try to translate everything that inspired us to create it. We love our project, and we want you to love the world that we came up with.

name: Edd the Duck 2: Back with a Quack!
Eden - World Builder
summary:
Explore a world of limitless possibility. Build your own personal Eden. Unleash your creative and adventurous spirit!

Eden is a game that lets you do awesome things with blocks.  The game engine enables crazy sandbox fun. Build, destroy and explore your way through endless worlds. What will you make?

Fun for all ages and played by millions; Eden is a best selling game on the App Store and has just received its biggest update yet!


Features: 
* Huge worlds to explore, build, and destroy 
* All kinds of materials to build with
* Colors
* Fire and explosives
* Fireworks, portals, paint bombs, lights, doors and treasure cubes
* Lovable creatures, including new aggressive ones
* Community: share your builds with friends and explore new worlds
* Millions of user created worlds

name: Edgar
summary: Edgar" is a 2D hardcore platformer game which you'll play as Edgar through challenging levels looking for your missing girlfriend Eve.

name: Edgy
summary: Shoot, slice, and break some necks in this hard-hitting FPS.

name: Educational Enamours
summary: Educational Enamours is visual novel for adult only, young student Connor balances a new love, a mysterious teacher, and an old attraction, a childhood friend. Love, intrigue - your choice.

name: EduNumbers
summary: EduNumbers is an educational software for children in the age of 3-6.

name: Edge of Eternity: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
• The base game
• The Digital Artbook
• The Original Soundtrack
• The War Nekaroo Skin
• The Goodies Pack

name: Editor-dle
summary: A 5-letter word based guessing game based around video editing terms.

name: Eden Falling
summary: Survive after the Fall, in Razor Edge Games' premiere post-apocalyptic RPG. Experience a unique take on an old genre.

name: Edgy Fantasy Battle Deluxe
summary: LD42 Tactics game with a 99-level party

name: Eden: World Builder Simulator
summary: A 2016 mobile game based on the British television series Eden.

name: Edna & Harvey Bundle
summary: Classic point-and-click adventure gameplay like in the good old days! Experience these two classics full of bizarre characters, wacky (and sometimes twisted) humor, crazy dialogue and challenging puzzles.

name: EdoPro
summary: A Yu-Gi-Oh multiplayer card simulation updating game available for download on Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android. A fork of the YGOPro client.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Lunchroom Rumble
summary: During lunchtime at the school, everyone declares a food fight. Whomever wins will become the ultimate food fight champion.

name: Eden: Project New Earth
summary: Eden: Project New Earth is a first-/third-person open world sci-fi survival game and lets you experience the adventure in single player or multiplayer just the way you like it. Play as you like, on servers or locally, with friends or strangers, together in PVE or against each other in PVP.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Clash of the Idiots
summary: The Masked Mumbler (Edd) has to defeat Lee Kanker 3 times so The Kanker Sisters will finally leave him alone.

name: Edgar: Bokbok in Boulzac
summary: Edgar is an adventure game set in a crazy and comic universe based on strong dialogues and colourful characters.

name: Edward's Sewer Adventure
summary:
"I'm going to tell you the story, the story of how I got lost in the sewers..."

In Edward's Sewer Adventure

You explore the depths of the sewers found on Pine Island. Located beneath the city, hidden from plain sight, many things can take place in the dark. Strange noises have been recorded. Are you brave enough to venture into the dark and damp smelly sewers? Or are you chicken...
You will meet friends unlooked for and evil forces on your journey.
You will experience revolutionary 3D-Graphics. A true stable of cutting edge PSX technology.

name: Edenbound
summary: Journey through darkness with "Edenbound." A red panda braves chaos to reach Eden amidst encroaching demons. Navigate landscapes, confront foes, and unravel mysteries. Guide the panda, restore balance.

name: EDF Secret Base
summary: After clearing the YMF500G space station, Duke returned to Earth and went to the EDF Headquarters to ask what the hell happened in the space station.

name: Edibles
summary: Escape the kitchen and find yourself in an ever ending world of beauty and woes! Lots of puzzles to solve to avoid ending up either squashed, eaten blended or just thrown away in the trash! Where can a tomato find peace? What is a tomato's purpose in life? You decide!

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy's Candy Machine Deluxe
summary: A flash game from Cartoon Network's main site for their popular show Ed Edd n' Eddy in which you create elaborate tubes to get a jawbreaker into a cup.

name: Educational Suite
summary: "Explore a world of fun and learning! Educational Suite offers engaging mini-games to help kids develop essential skills. Join the adventure now!"

name: Edge of Time: Rise of the Aeus
summary: As the war between humans and immortals rage upon every corner of world, threatening humanity into extinction, an outlaw, a former soldier and a pacifist, embarks on a mission to find a mysterious shard that said to be the only key to humanity's salvation.

name: Edd the Duck!
summary: On childrens TV in the early 90s, Edd the Duck and Wilson the arm were the familiar puppets helping with the link sections. Like most child-oriented licenses of the day, his first computer outing was a platform game, scrolling vertically and resembling Rainbow Islands, although much simplified.

name: Edgeless
summary: Start with the edge pieces? No way! Try this challenging ,yet approachable, 63 piece jigsaw game that has no edge pieces! 50 jigsaws to complete or choose your own!

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Ed Over Heels
summary: The Eds perform tricks to impress Nazz. There are three levels in the game. Each one has you controlling a different Ed, and as the game progresses the difficulty increases.

name: Eden Universe
summary: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a god? This game will definitely answer that question. In Eden Universe, you play the role of a god tasked with leading his people to victory and glory. Start your own religion and use divine powers to rule the universe of Eden.

name: Edge Road
summary: Edge-Road is an action game that tells the story of an ordinary student who becomes the most famous and popular person in his school. Help students, become a local vigilante, and experience a school life worthy of an 'Edgelord'.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Spin Stadium
summary: Knock the other kids' tops out of the stadium to get the highest score you can in this classic Cartoon Network Flash game.

name: Edelweiss
summary:
How hard would you study if a good GPA can take you to an erotic paradise?

Kazushi Haruma and his friends are fed up with their terrible grades and even more boring school life. Just as their youthful passions were about to burst, they found out about an exchange program that promises to send the best and brightest to an all-girls school located on a remote island.

For the first time in their lives, Kazushi and his friends were excited.
Utilizing their barely legal, "The Cunning" strategy, they managed to earn the ticket to their dreams and manly glory.
Ambition and lust begins to fill their hearts and crotches.

Lying in wait for Kazushi and his friends was an unimaginable environment and a garden of woman hotter than they could imagine!

name: Eden Tactics
summary: Eden Tactics is a competitive digital card game. Simple rules and deep reading, casual digital cards for a new era. Read your opponent's hand and make the best move!

name: Edict
summary: Welcome to Edict! Take up the role of a fortunate judgement agent sent to destroy the word of Nowherehoods soul engine!
